meanings.definition: To improve upon or surpass in achievement or quality.
meanings.sent1: Eating fruits and vegetables betters your health.
meanings.sent3: Trying to run faster than a cheetah only betters your chances of getting tired!
meanings.sent4: Her determination betters any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: Practice betters your skills over time.

meanings.definition: A person who is superior in ability, achievement, or quality.
meanings.sent1: The teacher is one of the betters in the school.
meanings.sent2: She always strives to be one of the betters in her field.
meanings.sent3: The betters in the race were neck and neck until the very end.
meanings.sent4: He stood out as one of the betters in the competition.
meanings.sent5: The betters inspire others to reach higher goals.
